Ai Terms

AI
Artificial Intelligence, the simulation of human intelligence in machines.
ML
Machine Learning, a subset of AI that enables systems to learn from data.
DL
Deep Learning, a type of ML that uses neural networks with many layers.

AI Technologies Comparison

Technology Description Applications
Artificial Intelligence Simulation of human intelligence in machines. Robotics, Automation, Decision Making
Machine Learning Systems that learn from data to improve performance. Predictive Analytics, Recommendation Systems
Deep Learning A subset of ML using neural networks with many layers. Image Recognition, Natural Language Processing
